title: The Crown of Saint Edward
data:
| \[   The Crown of Saint Edward   [![Etched helmet.png](/images/3/33/Etched_helmet.png)](/wiki/File:Etched_helmet.png) |                                                                                                                                          |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                                                                                                             | [helm of telepathy](/wiki/Helm_of_telepathy "Helm of telepathy")                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                          |
| Affiliation                                                                                                           | - [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful")
- [Yeoman](/wiki/Yeoman "Yeoman")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifacts "Intelligent artifacts") |
|                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                          |
| When carried                                                                                                          | * [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")
* [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage")       |
| When worn                                                                                                             | extrinsic [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy")                                                                                       |
| When invoked                                                                                                          | *(none)*                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                          |
| Base price                                                                                                            | 5000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                       |
| Weight                                                                                                                | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                              |

**The Crown of Saint Edward** is the [Yeoman](/wiki/Yeoman "Yeoman") quest artifact in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It is a lawful [helm of telepathy](/wiki/Helm_of_telepathy "Helm of telepathy") which also provides [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") and [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage") when carried.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Strategy](#Strategy)

  - [1.1 For yeomen](#For_yeomen)
  - [1.2 For others](#For_others)

- [2 Origin](#Origin)

## Strategy

### For yeomen

As is true for other roles whose quest artifacts provide magic resistance, Yeomen will not want to rely on the Crown as their only source of magic resistance - losing your only source of magic resistance to the [Wizard of Yendor](/wiki/Wizard_of_Yendor "Wizard of Yendor") can be a game-ending mistake. Outside of this, most Yeomen will probably want to wear the Crown, since the extrinsic telepathy is useful and yeomen are unlikely to be spellcasters.

### For others

In SLASH'EM, the Crown is one of five lawful quest artifacts which provide magic resistance, the other four being [the Orb of Detection](/wiki/The_Orb_of_Detection "The Orb of Detection"), [The Magic Mirror of Merlin](/wiki/The_Magic_Mirror_of_Merlin "The Magic Mirror of Merlin"), [the Sceptre of Might](/wiki/The_Sceptre_of_Might "The Sceptre of Might"), and [the Stake of Van Helsing](/wiki/The_Stake_of_Van_Helsing "The Stake of Van Helsing").

As an artifact wish for a lawful character seeking magic resistance, the Crown provides all the same intrinsics as the Orb of Detection at 1⁄3 of the weight, with the telepathy requiring the Crown to be worn as its only "drawback". Half spell damage combined with magic resistance also blunts the impact of the [psi boltsand](/wiki/Psi_bolt "Psi bolt") [curse items](/wiki/Curse_items "Curse items") [monster spells](/wiki/Monster_spell "Monster spell"), and gives the Crown the edge over the Magic Mirror. The Sceptre is still a worthy choice with its slotless and hungerless conflict, but only deals +5 damage against cross-aligned monsters, while the Stake is a fine weapon with its +12 damage bonus, but lacks any properties beyond magic resistance. The Mirror is probably most worth wishing for as a supplement to the Crown for characters that prefer a [helm of brilliance](/wiki/Helm_of_brilliance "Helm of brilliance"), plan to make use of the [helm of opposite alignment](/wiki/Helm_of_opposite_alignment "Helm of opposite alignment"), or are frequently [polymorphed](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") into a form that cannot wear helms.

## Origin

[![Wikipedia](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "Wikipedia")

[Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page "wikipedia:Main Page") has an article about:

***[St Edward's Crown](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St_Edward%27s_Crown "wikipedia:St Edward's Crown")***

The crown of Saint Edward is the actual name of the crown of the monarch of Great Britain.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"More quality passes. Update to reflect THEM/Hack'EM."*

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

The Crown of Saint Edward

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   The Crown of Saint Edward  
Base item helm of telepathy
Affiliation
  • lawful
  • Yeoman
  • intelligent
When carried
  • magic resistance
  • half spell damage
When worn extrinsic telepathy
When invoked (none)
Base price 5000 zm
Weight 50

The Crown of Saint Edward is the Yeoman quest artifact in SLASH'EM. It is a lawful helm of telepathy which also provides magic resistance and half spell damage when carried.

Contents

  • 1 Strategy
    • 1.1 For yeomen
    • 1.2 For others
  • 2 Origin

Strategy

For yeomen

As is true for other roles whose quest artifacts provide magic resistance, Yeomen will not want to rely on the Crown as their only source of magic resistance - losing your only source of magic resistance to the Wizard of Yendor can be a game-ending mistake. Outside of this, most Yeomen will probably want to wear the Crown, since the extrinsic telepathy is useful and yeomen are unlikely to be spellcasters.

For others

In SLASH'EM, the Crown is one of five lawful quest artifacts which provide magic resistance, the other four being the Orb of Detection, The Magic Mirror of Merlin, the Sceptre of Might, and the Stake of Van Helsing.

As an artifact wish for a lawful character seeking magic resistance, the Crown provides all the same intrinsics as the Orb of Detection at 1⁄3 of the weight, with the telepathy requiring the Crown to be worn as its only "drawback". Half spell damage combined with magic resistance also blunts the impact of the psi boltsand curse items monster spells, and gives the Crown the edge over the Magic Mirror. The Sceptre is still a worthy choice with its slotless and hungerless conflict, but only deals +5 damage against cross-aligned monsters, while the Stake is a fine weapon with its +12 damage bonus, but lacks any properties beyond magic resistance. The Mirror is probably most worth wishing for as a supplement to the Crown for characters that prefer a helm of brilliance, plan to make use of the helm of opposite alignment, or are frequently polymorphed into a form that cannot wear helms.

Origin

Wikipedia has an article about:
St Edward's Crown

The crown of Saint Edward is the actual name of the crown of the monarch of Great Britain.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"More quality passes. Update to reflect THEM/Hack'EM."
